name: Police Demo
description:
In an era of limited law enforcement, how does the police secure justice?

P.D. simulates the life of a rookie police officer during a time inspired by
the early Victorian period.

Features:

🔦 Patrol your town's street while being on alert for anything suspicious.

🔦 Attend to those in distress, and ensure their safety from further harm.

🔦 Investigate the scene where crimes are suspected to have taken place.

Average length:

15 - 30 minutes

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

Move: Arrow keys 

Sprint: Shift/double tap arrow key

Confirm: Z

Cancel: X

(key configuration available in game options)
